fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sron.plugins

Class StandardMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sron.plugins.StandardMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageI, java.io.Serializable

    public class StandardMessage
extends java.lang.Object
implements MessageI
    The class StandardMessage implements a standard message that can be sent over the ring overlay network.

    Description

    Implementation Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2019-04-05

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
